full_summary:
**Rental of Truck or Trailer Mounted LED Video Walls**
===================================================================

* **Title**: Rental of Truck or Trailer Mounted LED Video Walls
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012283
* **Solicitation Number**: 10211511A

**Tender Information**
--------------------

* **Deadline**: Tender closing date has expired. Information is provided for archiving purposes only.
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Details**
--------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Heritage (Patrimoine canadien)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 1030 Innes Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1B4S7, Canada
* **End User Entities**: Canadian Heritage (Patrimoine canadien)

**Contract Description**
-----------------------

The resulting contract will have a term of three years, with an option for two one-year extensions. The contract involves the rental of truck or trailer-mounted LED video walls.

**Additional Information**
------------------------

* **Trade Agreements**: Affected by the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others.
* **Access to Tenders**: Find additional information and tender documents [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/2a273b761f9ffaf66d916144fc74fe79/10211511a_-_rfso_en_final.pdf) (French version: [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/65c82308c238cc2d621ee8f59c8c1436/10211511a_-_rfso_fr_final.pdf)).

Contact information for this tender can be found by [clicking here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/tenders.html).
